dc_title_s: Insvla Zeilan, olim Taprobana, nunc incolis Tenarisim
dc_description_s: Cartographic Details: Scale approximately 1:1,000,000. Cartouche title. Engraved. Colours, including gilt. Simple cylindrical projection. East to top of sheet.Inscriptions are mainly Portuguese. Technical Details: 2 scales: 6 milliaria Germanica communia (= 4,2 cm), 7 milliaria Hispanica communia (= 4,2 cm).|39.6 x 49.2 centimeters|Scale approximately 1:1,000,000|Ames Library of South Asia Maps
